title: I Bought RP in order to gift a skin and a chroma but can't happen!
body: After gifting the skin i realized i can't gift the chroma! What kinda of bullshiite is that? If i knew we can't gift chromas i would have bought the rp for gift ,now there is left rp useless in my account for the chroma purchase. Can someone from riot assist me in gifting the Rp i have on my acc?(since after all its their systems fail all that mess)

replies.body:
If that RP purchase was recent enough and it hasn't been used, we might be able to get that refunded in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) since you couldn't use it to send that Chroma. There are a few reasons as to why the store won't let you gift chromas, and I'm happy to go over 'em with you if you want! 

Overall though if you want to gift him that chroma, you'll need to just gift him the RP itself.

hey whats up? why u dont refund me my second purchase that was accidently made during the whole proccess of the subject above? wtf is that logic? i pressed everythign what was told to gift rp to a friend and the rp went on my acc and after doing it fro the second time succesfully u refuse to refund the previous action?wtf are u that cheap? i mean if so need the changes to survive i dont mind givingu 2,5euro like i would give to a homeless but get real for a second

I can't directly issue refunds from here on the boards. Like I mentioned in my first reply, hit up our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get that process started.
i did but i dont think they realized what they were saying cause they just refused and thats it

I went ahead and pulled up that ticket to see what's going on there. Looks like those agents *did* actually did a one-time exception refund one of those RP purchases for you the first time you wrote in. After that, you requested another refund for having made the exact same mistake. 

Above in my first reply you'll see that I tried to let you know that you *cannot gift chromas*. The only way to 'gift' a chroma to someone is to gift them the RP. Slow down a bit when you're making those purchases and make sure you read what's about to be bought.
